## Step 1: Initial Search in Ares

Used Ares (a tool built to generate reports from CGSpace) to run an initial search.

**Filters applied:**

-   Repitory: CGSpace.

-   Community: International Potato Center.

-   Country: China.

-   Date Range: 2015 - 2025

**Results:** 21 publications identified.

## Step 2: List Review and Expansion

Phillip Kear (CIP) reviewed the initial list and added additional relevant entries.\
**Updated total:** 41 publications.

## Step 3: Full-text Retrieval

Collect all the documents (41 in total) to a sharepoint.

## Step 4: [Notebook LLM](https://notebooklm.google/){target="_blank"}

The pdf references were uploaded to NotebookLLM (by Google) and we passed the following prompt reference by reference:

::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal" title="ChatGPT  4o prompt to NotebookLLM" collapse="true"}
```md
Reference Title: [Full title]
Year: [Publication year]
Core Analysis:
‚Ä¢	What is the document‚Äôs main objective?
‚Ä¢	What are the key findings or results?
‚Ä¢	Which findings are most significant or relevant?
‚Ä¢	What conclusions were drawn and how do they relate to the objectives?
‚Ä¢	Briefly describe the context, focus, and approach (if it helps explain results).
Goal:
‚Ä¢	What was the aim of this work?
‚Ä¢	How was it pursued and achieved?
Results & Impact:
‚Ä¢	What was accomplished?
‚Ä¢	Any measurable outcomes (e.g., yield gains, new varieties, income boost, disease resistance)?
‚Ä¢	Were any tools, methods, models, or policies developed?
‚Ä¢	Mention names of varieties, stats, or adoption details.
Funding & Institutions:
‚Ä¢	Who funded it?
‚Ä¢	Who led the work (e.g., CIP, CCCAP, CAAS)?
Tags:
‚Ä¢	Choose key themes (e.g., climate adaptation, pest control, food security, etc.)
APA Citation:
‚Ä¢	Format: AuthorLastName, Initials. (Year). Title in italics. Source, volume(issue), pages. https://doi.org/xxx
Purpose Reminder:
‚Ä¢	Show CCCAP/CIP‚Äôs impact in China.
‚Ä¢	Highlight real-world benefits to inform donors, partners, and the research community.
```
:::
